en: I think you'll find our Napa Chardonnay to have hints of vanilla and caramel with a velvety smooth finish.
zh: 我想你会发现我们的纳帕夏敦埃酒有一丝香草和焦糖的味道，回味柔和顺滑。

en: Are you all right?
zh: 你没事吧？

en: Some days are better than others. Thanks for asking.
zh: 有些日子比较好，谢谢关心。

en: It's very good.
zh: 非常好。

en: Yeah, 2004 was a great year for this wine. Not so much for me. Enjoy.
zh: 是的，2004年对这种酒来说是很好的一年，但对我来说就不是了，好好享受吧。

en: So, did I talk you into that soufflé?
zh: 我说服你做蛋奶酥了吗？

en: Uh, yeah, two.
zh: 是的，两个。

en: Good call. You won't want to share. Oh, God.
zh: 好主意，你不会想分享的，天啊。

en: More butter and salt. They only need to live long enough to pay the check.
zh: 多加点黄油和盐，他们只要活到支票付款就行了。

en: Beat those egg whites gently as if they were a small, annoying child.
zh: 轻轻地拍打蛋白，就好像它们是一个又小又烦人的孩子。

en: Paul, you're on fire again.
zh: 保罗，你又着火了。

en: Um, Christy, you got a second?
zh: 克丽丝蒂，你有空吗？

en: I can't talk now, Gabriel. I'm working.
zh: 我现在不方便说话，加布里尔，我在工作。

en: Yeah, I know, but, uh, here's the thing. I'm getting a lot of complaints.
zh: 是的，我知道，但是，呃，事情是这样的，我收到了很多投诉。

en: Really? About what?
zh: 真的? 关于什么？

en: Well, apparently, one of my waitresses is having a nervous breakdown.
zh: 显然，我的一个女服务员精神崩溃了。

en: Is it Jennifer?
zh: 是詹妮弗吗？

en: Is it Carol?
zh: 是卡罗尔吗？

en: It's you!
zh: 是你！

en: Gabriel, what does this taste like to you?
zh: 加布里埃尔，你觉得这是什么味道？

en: Uh, mushrooms?
zh: 蘑菇？

en: The correct answer was "ass."
zh: 正确答案是“屁股”

en: Listen, maybe you should take the rest of the night off.
zh: 听着，也许你今晚该休息了。

en: I can't afford to do that. I have children to feed.
zh: 我负担不起，我还有孩子要养。

en: Not a problem. Grab a couple steaks, head home and feed 'em.
zh: 没问题，拿几块牛排回家喂它们。

en: You don't understand. The guy at table 4 said something horrible to me when I was telling him about the salmon.
zh: 你不明白。我跟4号桌的人说三文鱼的事时他对我说了很可怕的话。

en: What's wrong with the salmon? Nothing, the salmon's great!
zh: - 三文鱼怎么了?-没什么，三文鱼很好吃！

en: The guy insulted me.
zh: 那家伙侮辱了我。

en: Oh, that's fine.
zh: 没关系。

en: What did he say?
zh: 他说什么？

en: He said I was "a good waitress."
zh: 他说我是个“好服务员”

en: That's not bad. Or true.
zh: 不错，或者说是真的。

en: I didn't grow up to be a "good waitress"
zh: 我没有长大成为一个“好服务员”

en: That was never the plan.
zh: 计划不是这样的。

en: The plan was to be a psychologist.
zh: 我的计划是成为一名心理学家。

en: Okay. You're a young woman. You can still do that.
zh: 好吧，你是个年轻女人，你还是可以做到的。

en: Yeah, maybe. I'd probably have to graduate high school first.
zh: 也许吧，我可能得先从高中毕业。

en: Now all I've got to look forward to is serving $60 risotto to a bunch of smug food Nazis.
zh: 现在我唯一能期待的就是给一群自以为是的食物纳粹提供60美元的意大利调味饭。

en: I mean, who are we kidding? It's a big, steaming pile of gooey rice!
zh: 我的意思是，我们在骗谁呢? 这是一大堆热气腾腾的粘糊糊的米饭！

en: What did you say?
zh: 你说什么？

en: Get over yourself, Rudy. I saw you at McDonald's going down on a Big Mac.
zh: 别自以为是了，鲁迪，我看到你在麦当劳吃巨无霸。

en: First of all, it was a Filet-O-Fish.
zh: 首先，这是菲力鱼。

en: And for you?
zh: 你呢？

en: I'd like the pounded capon with lemongrass and thyme.
zh: 我要加柠檬草和百里香的鸡肉。

en: Excellent choice. You know that's a castrated chicken they beat with a hammer.
zh: 明智的选择，你知道他们用锤子打的是阉割过的鸡。

en: Daily affirmations.
zh: 每日自我肯定。

en: I open my heart and allow wonderful things to flow into my life.
zh: 我敞开心扉，让美好的事物进入我的生活。

en: My daughter's an easy lay and it's not my fault.
zh: 我女儿很容易上床，这不是我的错。

en: I'm sorry. Did I wake you?
zh: 抱歉，我吵醒你了吗？

en: That's okay. How was work?
zh: 没关系，工作怎么样？

en: Oh, fun. I feel guilty taking the money. What'd you do tonight?
zh: 有意思，拿了钱我很内疚，你今晚做了什么？

en: Not much. Did my homework, watched TV.
zh: 没什么，做作业，看电视。

en: Is there a TV on your ceiling?
zh: 你家天花板上有电视吗？

en: What?
zh: 什么？

en: Sit down. We need to talk.
zh: 坐下，我们得谈谈。

en: What's up?
zh: 怎么了？

en: Violet, I can't tell you not to have sex at your age, because I had sex at your age.
zh: 维奥莉特，我不能告诉你在你这个年纪不要做爱因为我在你这个年纪就做爱了。

en: Mom, I'm not having sex.
zh: 妈妈，我没有做爱。

en: Don't lie to the woman who washes your sheets.
zh: 不要对给你洗床单的女人撒谎。

en: And in case you've forgotten, I got pregnant with you when I was a teenager.
zh: 别忘了，我十几岁的时候就怀上你了。

en: And please don't take this the wrong way, It ruined my life.
zh: 别误会，这毁了我的生活。

en: I love you, too, Mom?
zh: 我也爱你，妈妈？

en: And I can't tell you not to drink and smoke pot, because my senior yearbook quote was:
zh: 我不能告诉你不要喝酒，不要抽大麻因为我的毕业纪念册上说过:

en: "Let's drink and smoke pot"
zh: “我们喝酒抽大麻吧”

en: Can this please be over?
zh: 能不能快点结束？

en: You don't know how lucky you are. My mother never bothered to talk to me about this stuff.
zh: 你不知道你有多幸运，我妈妈从来不跟我说这些。

en: Yeah, this is over.
zh: 是的，结束了。

en: Honey, I just don't want you to wake up one day and feel bad 'cause you're not a psychologist!
zh: 亲爱的，我只是不想你有一天醒来，因为你不是心理学家而感到难过！

en: Okay, good talk!
zh: 好吧，聊得很愉快！

en: Let's get you back in your own bed.
zh: 我们回你自己的床上去吧。

en: Hi, Mom.
zh: 嗨，妈妈。

en: Hi, sweetie.
zh: 嗨，亲爱的。

en: I waited up for you.
zh: 我一直在等你。

en: Thank you.
zh: 谢谢你。

en: Violet's boyfriend was over.
zh: 维奥莉特的男朋友分手了。

en: I know.
zh: 我知道。

en: They were kissing.
zh: 他们在接吻。

en: I'm sure they were.
zh: 我想也是。

en: They took a shower together.
zh: 他们一起洗澡。

en: Terrific.
zh: 好极了。

en: Are you coming to my talent show tomorrow?
zh: 你明天来看我的才艺表演吗？

en: Tomorrow? What time?
zh: 明天? 什么时候？

en: Oh, honey, I have to work the lunch shift.
zh: 亲爱的，我得上午班。

en: It's okay. I'm not good anyway.
zh: 没关系，反正我也不好。

en: Listen, maybe I can get someone to cover my shift.
zh: 听着，也许我可以找人替我的班。

en: Don't worry about it.
zh: 别担心。

en: No, I want you to be able to look out into the audience and see me, because that
zh: 不，我希望你能看到观众的眼睛看到我，因为

en: way you'll know how much I...
zh: 让你知道我有多..。

en: Mommy, I'm sleeping.
zh: 妈妈，我在睡觉。

en: Good talk.
zh: 聊得很愉快。

en: You feeling better?
zh: 感觉好点了吗？

en: Oh, yeah. My home is a real oasis.
zh: 哦，是的，我的家是一个真正的绿洲。

en: So, am I in trouble with Chef Rudy?
zh: 鲁迪大厨找我麻烦了吗？

en: He'll be fine. He bought an eight ball and took home the pastry chef.
zh: 他不会有事的，他买了一个八号球然后把糕点师带回家了。

en: Sleeping with your boss. Who does that?
zh: 和你老板上床，谁会这么做？

en: Mom...?
zh: 妈妈？

en: Yeah, honey?
zh: 怎么了，亲爱的？

en: I had a bad dream.
zh: 我做了个恶梦。

en: Oh, no, well, um... why don't you go back to bed and I'll come lay down with you in a second?
zh: 不用了，你先回去睡吧我一会儿就过来陪你？

en: I'm so sorry. I owe you one.
zh: 对不起，我欠你个人情。

en: Don't lay there too long. The sprinklers come on in ten minutes.
zh: 别在那儿躺太久，洒水器十分钟后就开了。

en: What the hell?
zh: 搞什么鬼？

en: Can I help you?
zh: 需要帮忙吗？

en: What time is the talent show?
zh: 才艺表演是什么时候？

en: What talent show?
zh: 什么才艺表演？

en: There's no talent show today?
zh: 今天没有才艺表演吗？

en: I don't think so.
zh: 我不这么认为。

en: Are you freaking kidding me?!
zh: 开什么玩笑！

en: I lost a day's pay for no reason?
zh: 我白白损失了一天的工资？

en: Maybe we were destined to meet.
zh: 也许我们注定要相遇。

en: It would definitely be the high point of my day.
zh: 这绝对是我今天的高潮。

en: Roscoe!
zh: 罗斯科！

en: Hi, Mom.
zh: 嗨，妈妈。

en: What are you doing here?
zh: 你在这里做什么？

en: The talent show?
zh: 才艺表演？

en: That's not today.
zh: 不是今天。

en: But you said it was!
zh: 但你说是的！

en: Guess I was wrong.
zh: 看来我错了。

en: I guess you were.
zh: 我想是的。

en: Don't you kids tease him about this.
zh: 你们别拿这事取笑他。

en: Son of a bitch!
zh: 狗娘养的！

en: Oh, God, I need a drink.
zh: 天啊，我要喝一杯。

en: Hi, I'm Christy and I'm an alcoholic.
zh: 嗨，我是克丽丝蒂，我是个酒鬼。

en: I've been sober 118 days. Oh, don't applaud for that. They've been the worst 118 days of my life.
zh: - 我已经戒酒118天了-别为这个鼓掌，这是我一生中最糟糕的118天。

en: The only reason I'm here is because, I didn't want to turn into my mother.
zh: 我来这里的唯一原因是，我不想变成我妈那样。

en: And I did anyway. Yeah, I drank like her. I went through men like her. Um, I was selfish to my kids just like she was.
zh: 但我还是这么做了。是的，我像她一样酗酒。我经历过像她这样的男人。我对我的孩子很自私，就像她一样。

en: And I didn't know how to live any other way because she was my only role model.
zh: 我不知道如何以其他方式生活因为她是我唯一的榜样。

en: I mean, some mothers teach their daughters how to bake.
zh: 有些母亲会教女儿烘焙。

en: Mine taught me how to beat a cavity search and still feel like a lady.
zh: 我父亲教会了我如何避免体腔检查还能保持淑女的感觉。

en: Anyway, thanks for letting me share.
zh: 不管怎样，谢谢你让我分享。

en: And I cannot tell you how comforting it is to be in a room with people who are just as screwed up as I am, so...
zh: 我无法告诉你和跟我一样一团糟的人共处一室是多么令人欣慰，所以..。

en: Oh, stop it.
zh: 别说了。

en: Hi, I'm Jim and I'm an alcoholic.
zh: 嗨，我是吉姆，我是个酒鬼。

en: Aren't you a little old to be blaming all your problems on your mother?
zh: 你把所有的问题都怪在你妈身上，是不是有点老了？

en: Hi, Mom.
zh: 嗨，妈妈。

en: Hi, I'm Greg. May I take your order?
zh: 嗨，我是格雷格，请问您要点什么？

en: Hi, Greg. I'm Bonnie and this is my daughter, Christy.
zh: 嗨 Greg 我是 Bonnie 这是我女儿 Christy。

en: She and I haven't spoken in a couple of years, so this is kind of a big moment for us.
zh: 她和我已经好几年没说过话了所以这对我们来说是个重要的时刻。

en: Oh, for God's sake.
zh: 看在上帝的份上。

en: What can you recommend for a mother and daughter who are reconnecting after
zh: 你有什么可以推荐的母亲和女儿谁是重新连接后

en: a long, angry silence?
zh: 长时间的愤怒的沉默？

en: Mom, please, just order.
zh: 妈妈，拜托，点菜吧。

en: Um, is the mint tea decaffeinated?
zh: 薄荷茶不含咖啡因吗？

en: Do you promise? If I have caffeine after 2:00, my sleep in ruined.
zh: 你保证吗，如果我两点以后还喝咖啡，我的睡眠就毁了。

en: I promise.
zh: 我保证。

en: Okay, Greg, but if I wake up in the middle of the night, I'm calling you.
zh: 好吧，格雷格，但如果我半夜醒来，我会给你打电话的。

en: Well, I'll give you my number.
zh: 我把电话号码给你。

en: Um, and for you? We have a lovely selection of local wines.
zh: 你呢? 我们有很多当地的葡萄酒。

en: I'll have a bottle of each and a funnel.
zh: 我要每种一瓶，还有一个漏斗。

en: She's kidding. We're both in Alcoholics Anonymous.
zh: 她开玩笑的我们都是匿名戒酒会。

en: Mom, it's Alcoholics Anonymous, not Alcoholics Tell Your Waiter.
zh: 妈妈这是匿名戒酒会不是酒鬼告诉服务生的。

en: Water is fine. Here, take this knife away from me.
zh: 水就可以了，来，把这把刀拿开。

en: So, when were you going to tell me you quit drinking?
zh: 你打算什么时候告诉我你戒酒了？

en: Well, I was afraid if I called you, I'd just start again.
zh: 我怕如果我打电话给你，我会重新开始。

en: Not that you care, but I have two years clean and sober myself.
zh: 虽然你不在乎，但我已经戒毒两年了。

en: You're right, I don't care.
zh: 你说得对，我不在乎。

en: Well, regardless, it has really changed my life.
zh: 不管怎样，它真的改变了我的生活。

en: I have a steady job. I exercise. I'm in a book club!
zh: 我有一份稳定的工作。我锻炼身体。我参加了一个读书俱乐部！

en: I have become the kind of woman I've always hated.
zh: 我变成了我一直讨厌的那种女人。

en: It is nice to see you wearing underwear. And not on your head.
zh: 很高兴看到你穿内裤，而不是头上。

en: Here we go.
zh: 开始了。

en: Oh, Greg, honey, can I trouble you for some water without ice? Ice isn't good for my digestive system.
zh: 哦，格雷格，亲爱的，我能麻烦你给我一些不加冰的水吗? 冰对我的消化系统不好。

en: Yeah, of course.
zh: 是的，当然。

en: Really? Ice? I think your digestive system has seen worse than ice.
zh: 真的? 冰? 我想你的消化系统见过比冰更糟的。

en: Excuse me?
zh: 你说什么？

en: Mom, I've watched you lick cocaine crumbs out of a shag carpet.
zh: 妈妈，我看过你从粗毛地毯上舔可卡因碎屑。

en: It's not a sin to be thrifty, dear.
zh: 节俭不是罪过，亲爱的。

en: Okay, here we go. Now, I hope that you're being nice to your mother.
zh: 好了，我们开始吧，现在，我希望你对你妈妈好一点。

en: Go away, Greg!
zh: 走开，格雷格！

en: Right.
zh: 对。

en: You know, just because you're sober doesn't mean you can't take a Xanax.
zh: 你清醒并不代表你不能吃阿普唑仑。

en: Actually, Mom, it sort of does.
zh: 事实上，妈妈，差不多就是这样。

en: Really? Maybe I don't have two years.
zh: 真的吗，也许我没有两年时间了。

en: And I don't need a Xanax, I'm doing great.
zh: 我不需要阿普唑仑，我很好。

en: Well, that's funny, 'cause your daughter says you're hanging on by your fingernails
zh: 真有意思，因为你女儿说你命悬一线

en: and sleeping with your boss.
zh: 和你老板上床。

en: Wait, when do you talk to Violet?
zh: 等等，你什么时候跟维奥莉特说话？

en: We talk all the time, and we're Facebook friends.
zh: 我们经常聊天，我们还是脸书好友。

en: I don't want her talking to you.
zh: 我不想让她跟你说话。

en: Well, she has to talk to somebody. She's sexually active, drinking, smoking grass. Sound familiar?
zh: 她得找人谈谈，她性生活活跃，酗酒，吸大麻，听起来耳熟吗？

en: You're making this about me?
zh: 你是在说我吗？

en: No, it's okay. I have come to understand that you were the best daughter you could be. My job is to forgive you, which I do.
zh: 不，没关系。我终于明白你是最好的女儿。我的工作就是原谅你，我做到了。

en: Oh, my God! You forgive me?
zh: 天啊，你原谅我了吗？

en: I've come a long way.
zh: 我经历了很多。

en: Excuse me, but if anybody needs to be forgiven, it's you, and I don't, and I never will.
zh: 不好意思，如果有人需要被原谅，那就是你，我不需要，也永远不会原谅。

en: There's hardly a day I can remember that I didn't come home to an empty house.
zh: 我几乎没有一天不是回到空荡荡的家。

en: Oh, don't be so dramatic.
zh: 别这么夸张。

en: While other mothers were cooking dinner, you were cooking meth.
zh: 别的妈妈做晚饭的时候，你在做冰毒。

en: Otherwise known as "working."
zh: 也就是所谓的“工作”

en: I don't want you in my life. And while you're at it, stay away from my daughter!
zh: 我不想你出现在我的生活中，还有，离我女儿远点！

en: She may need a better role model than me, but it's certainly not you.
zh: 她可能需要一个比我更好的榜样，但肯定不是你。

en: Is everything okay?
zh: 出什么事了吗？

en: My daughter doesn't get me.
zh: 我女儿不懂我。

en: Oh. I'm sorry.
zh: 哦，对不起。

en: What time do you get off work? I could use a lap to cry on.
zh: 你什么时候下班? 我想找个地方哭一场。

en: Stop crying. It wasn't an important finger. This doesn't concern you.
zh: 别哭了，不是什么重要的手指，这不关你的事。

en: Oh, good, you're still here.
zh: 太好了，你还在。

en: Hey, hi. This is a surprise.
zh: 嗨，真是个惊喜。

en: Yeah, I just really needed to talk to you. I am having the worst day.
zh: 是啊，我真的需要和你谈谈，我今天过得很糟糕。

en: Hey, you ready to go?
zh: 准备好走了吗？

en: Yes, dear. Um, Christy, you know my, uh, wife.
zh: 是的，亲爱的，克丽丝蒂，你认识我的妻子。

en: Yeah, hi, Claudia. Nice to see you again.
zh: 你好，克劳迪娅，很高兴再次见到你。

en: It's "Clowdia", FYI, the ladies' room needs some attention. I don't know if that's you, Christy.
zh: 是“ Clowdia”仅供参考，女厕所需要注意一下，我不知道那是不是你 Christy。

en: It's not, and it's "Christ-y."
zh: 不是，是“耶稣基督”

en: Okay, dear, let's go.
zh: 好了，亲爱的，我们走吧。

en: Don't serve the soup.
zh: 不要上汤。

en: Hey, Mom. Dad's here!
zh: 妈妈，爸爸来了！

en: Yo, yo, baby mama.
zh: 哟，哟，宝贝妈妈。

en: What do you want, Baxter?
zh: 你想要什么，巴克斯特？

en: A father can't visit his son?
zh: 父亲不能去看儿子吗？

en: Not when he's six months behind on child support, but you're welcome to wave
zh: 他已经拖欠六个月的抚养费了但你可以跟他挥挥手

en: at him through the window.
zh: 透过窗户看着他。

en: Be right back, Roscoe. Don't be afraid to hit the hookers with a bat.
zh: 马上回来，罗斯科，别害怕用球棒打妓女。

en: I think I may have found a way to pay you your child support.
zh: 我想我可能有办法付你的抚养费了。

en: Trust me, Baxter, you can't sell that much semen.
zh: 相信我，巴克斯特，你卖不了那么多精液。

en: I know. I tried.
zh: 我知道，我尽力了。

en: So, here's the deal. I know a guy who can hook me up with a couple of kilos of premium Sonoma Kush. All I need is $2000, from you.
zh: 这样吧。我认识一个人能帮我搞到几公斤高级索诺玛库什。我只需要你给我2000美元。

en: Just so I'm clear. You want to pay child support by borrowing money from
zh: 先说清楚，你想通过借钱来支付孩子的抚养费

en: me so you can buy pot?
zh: 然后你就可以买大麻了？

en: No. So I can sell pot.
zh: 不，这样我就能卖大麻了。

en: There's no money in buying pot. I know. I tried.
zh: - 买大麻没钱-我知道，我试过了。

en: What are you doing here?
zh: 你在这里做什么？

en: studying.
zh: 学习。

en: You let Violet have boys over while you're gone?
zh: 你不在的时候让维奥莉特带男孩过来吗？

en: No, I do not, and don't worry about her, she's not your kid.
zh: 不，我没有，别担心她，她不是你的孩子。

en: I know, but this sets a bad example for Roscoe.
zh: 我知道，但这给罗斯科树立了坏榜样。

en: Oh, you're worried about setting a bad example? You had Roscoe pee into a sippy cup so you could pass a drug test.
zh: 你担心会树立一个坏榜样？你让罗斯科往吸管里撒尿这样你就能通过药检了。

en: And it worked.
zh: 而且成功了。

en: I like bananas. They have their own carrying case.
zh: 我喜欢香蕉。他们有自己的手提箱。

en: You know I can't divorce Claudia. Her father owns the restaurant;
zh: 你知道我不能和 Claudia 离婚，她爸爸是餐厅老板

en: I'm pretty sure he'd fire me, and then what? I was an English major.
zh: 我很确定他会解雇我，然后呢? 我是英语专业的。

en: I can't believe you're sleeping with that loser.
zh: 真不敢相信你和那个废物上床了。

en: I can't believe you're sleeping with this loser!
zh: 真不敢相信你居然和这个废物上床！

en: Hey, we were mostly studying.
zh: 我们大部分时间都在学习。

en: Shut up, Luke.
zh: 闭嘴，卢克。

en: I love him.
zh: 我爱他。

en: Please, I used to love him!
zh: 拜托，我以前很爱他的！

en: She did.
zh: 是的。

en: Mom, Luke and I have been together for like a year. You only started noticing
zh: 妈，卢克和我在一起一年了，你才发现

en: when you stopped drinking.
zh: 当你戒酒的时候。

en: You're right. I haven't been a very good mother, and I'm sorry, but...
zh: 你说得对，我不是个好妈妈，我很抱歉，但是..。

en: But what? You want me to forgive you?
zh: 但是什么? 你想让我原谅你？

en: Oh, God, would you? That'd be awesome!
zh: 天啊，真的吗，那太棒了！

en: Why should I forgive you when you can't even forgive your own mother?
zh: 你连自己的母亲都不能原谅我为什么还要原谅你？

en: That's different.
zh: 那不一样。

en: How?
zh: 怎么做到的？

en: Okay. Hello, Mom, it's Christy. Yeah, yeah, today was a blast.
zh: 你好，妈妈，我是克丽丝蒂，今天真是太棒了。

en: Listen, I just want you to know that I forgive you for everything you did when I was growing up.
zh: 听着，我只想让你知道我原谅你在我成长过程中所做的一切。

en: I get, now, that you did the best you could, just like I'm doing.
zh: 我知道你已经尽力了，就像我一样。

en: And I hope that you and I can wipe the slate clean and start over.
zh: 我希望我们能重新开始。

en: No, I did not take a Xanax from your purse!
zh: 不，我没有从你包里拿阿普唑仑！

en: Listen, I gotta go. Yeah, talk soon.
zh: 我得挂了，回聊。

en: There. I've forgiven my mother. Are we good?
zh: 好了，我原谅我妈妈了，我们和好了吗？

en: It's not that easy.
zh: 没那么简单。

en: Oh, come on! Like me!
zh: 拜托，像我一样！

en: Hey, Dad! If you hit the hookers enough times, they give you your money back!
zh: 嘿，爸爸! 如果你打了妓女足够多次，他们会把你的钱还给你的！

en: Smart kid. That's my semen at work.
zh: 聪明的孩子，那是我工作时的精液。

en: You still living in that red van? Looks like your house is being towed.
zh: 你还住在那辆红色货车里? 看来你的房子被拖走了。

en: Oh, no, my cleaning lady's in there.
zh: 不，我的清洁女工在里面。

en: What a day, huh?
zh: 多美好的一天啊？

en: Oh, hi, Mom.
zh: 嗨，妈妈。

en: Hello, sweetie.
zh: 你好，亲爱的。

en: What are you doing here?
zh: 你在这里做什么？

en: I just thought I'd help out while you were at work. You know, clean slate.
zh: 我只是想趁你工作的时候帮帮忙，重新开始。

en: You didn't have to do that.
zh: 你不必这么做的。

en: Yeah, she did. Bonnie made Roscoe and me hot dinner.
zh: 是的 Bonnie 给我和 Roscoe 做了热腾腾的晚餐。

en: Yeah, but I...
zh: 是的，但是我..。

en: It was hot, Mom! Like on TV. Night, Bonnie.
zh: 很热，妈妈，就像电视上一样，晚安，邦妮。

en: She calls you Bonnie?
zh: 她叫你 Bonnie？

en: We're like sisters. You hungry?
zh: 我们就像姐妹一样，你饿吗？

en: No, thanks. I ate at the restaurant.
zh: 不用了，谢谢，我在餐厅吃过了。

en: How about some tea?
zh: 来点茶怎么样？

en: I'm so glad you and I have a chance to start over.
zh: 我很高兴我们有机会重新开始。

en: Forgive me, but I'm not quite there yet.
zh: 抱歉，我还没到那一步。

en: Of course I forgive you.
zh: 我当然原谅你。

en: You know, I apologized for being a crappy daughter. So, anything you wanna say to me...
zh: 你知道，我为我这个糟糕的女儿道歉，所以，你想对我说的任何话..。

en: I love you with all my heart.
zh: 我全心全意地爱你。

en: And?
zh: 然后呢？

en: And... from now on, I'm going to be the kind of mother you deserve. This is the start of a new chapter.
zh: 而且... 从现在开始，我会成为你应得的母亲。这是新篇章的开始。

en: Oh, it's my date!
zh: 我的约会对象来了！

en: New chapter, same book.
zh: 新的篇章，同一本书。

en: Ready to go?
zh: 可以走了吗？

en: Let me just get my bag.
zh: 我去拿包。

en: You remember our waiter Greg?
zh: 还记得我们的服务生格雷格吗？

en: Hi, new dad!
zh: 嗨，新爸爸！

en: Please stop. He's way to young for me.
zh: 别说了，他对我来说太年轻了。

en: And he's married.
zh: 而且他结婚了。

en: Married? What a whore.
zh: 结婚? 真是个婊子。

en: Oh, I almost forgot. Your daughter think she might be pregnant. Call me, if you need me.
zh: 哦，我差点忘了，你女儿觉得她可能怀孕了，如果你需要我，打电话给我。
